tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.ability.1.de: Remembers the point of sign's usage and returns an owner to it after %1$s sec, consuming %2$s experience point each second of active state. The second usage of relic with pressed %3$s button forcibly teleports to the last saved point
tooltip.relics.spatial_sign.ability.2.de: In case of taking a fatal damage with activated seal, the owner will be teleported to the last saved sign's point, but relic will be destroyed
tooltip.relics.spider_necklace.ability.1: Allows to clamber on the walls
tooltip.relics.spider_necklace.ability.2: Allows to move through cobweb with ease
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.1.name: Spraying
tooltip.relics.spore_sack.ability.1.desc: Has a %1$s chance of spraying venomous spores at the point of projectile's impact, poisoning all mobs in a %2$s blocks radius from the epicenter
tooltip.relics.reflection_necklace.abili: Accumulates up to %1$s charges of shield. Absorbs incoming damage and reflects %2$s out of it's value to attacker at a cost of one shield's charge
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.ability.1: Throws a disk, which makes up to %1$s bounces from the walls and causes damage in amount of %2$s to all mobs on it's way. Inflicted damage increases by %3$s for each bounce
tooltip.relics.space_dissector.ability.2: Forcibly returns a disk to it's owner. The usage with pressed %1$s button instantly teleports the owner to the current disk position
tooltip.relics.soul_devourer.ability.1.d: Absorbs souls of defeated mobs in the amount of %1$s of their maximum health. Increases the wearer's damage dealt by %2$s per each consumed soul
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.ability.1.de: Grants resistance from hot blocks damage
tooltip.relics.magma_walker.ability.2.de: Condenses lava under the wearer's feet, temporarily transforming it into solid magma stone
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.ability.1.d: %1$s movement speed in the night time
tooltip.relics.midnight_robe.ability.2.d: Hides the relic wearer while in places with lighting level lower than %1$s
tooltip.relics.old_boot.ability.1.name: Quick step
tooltip.relics.out_runner.ability.1.name: Acceleration
tooltip.relics.out_runner.ability.1.desc: %1$s movement speed per each second of running
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.ability.1: %1$s movement speed in the desert biomes
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.ability.3: Blocks suffocation damage and grants wearer invisibility while inside blocks
tooltip.relics.scarab_talisman.ability.4: Buries and digs wearer into the blocks underneath
tooltip.relics.shadow_glaive.ability.1.d: Fires a shadow glaive projectile that bounces off nearby targets up to %1$s times and deals %2$s damage. Every %3$s sec. refills 1 charge
Each attack with a %1$s chance can summon a falling star, that deals %2$s of the original damage. Works only at night
tooltip.relics.drowned_belt.ability.1.de: Allows to use trident "Riptide" enchantment without of rain or water, but increases it's recharge time
Accelerates elytra flight by consuming energy of the End, collected from the End air or dragon breath
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.ability.1.des: Endermans will be neutral to the wearer
tooltip.relics.enders_hand.ability.2.des: Swaps the wearer and the enderman along the line of sight
tooltip.relics.fragrant_flower.ability.1: Bees within a radius of %1$s blocks will fight alongside with the wearer
tooltip.relics.fragrant_flower.ability.2: Wearer's health regeneration increases by %1$s for each bee in the radius of %2$s blocks
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.ability.1.des: %1$s damage dealt to the undead enemies. %2$s chance to ignite undead by each hit
tooltip.relics.holy_locket.ability.3.des: Total invulnerability time after taking damage increased by %1$s sec.
tooltip.relics.jellyfish_necklace.abilit: Pushes wearer in the direction of sight if he is underwater
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.ability.1.name: Berserk
tooltip.relics.rage_glove.ability.1.desc: %1$s dealt and %2$s incoming damage per each hit, dealt in a %3$s sec. after latest
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.1.name: Slip
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.2.name: Ram
tooltip.relics.ice_skates.ability.2.desc: Pushes mobs and deals %1$s damage while colliding if running on the ice
tooltip.relics.camouflage_ring.ability.1: Makes wearer invisible while using among the grass
tooltip.relics.delay_ring.ability.1.name: Delay
tooltip.relics.delay_ring.ability.1.desc: Temporarily delays the wearer's fate, postponing any healing or damage taken by %1$s sec.
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.ability.1.de: Piglins will be neutral to the wearer
tooltip.relics.bastion_ring.ability.2.de: Piglins will point to the nearest bastion in the Nether
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.ability.1.d: Prevents fall damage if flask has fire
tooltip.relics.blazing_flask.ability.3.d: Consumes energy of fire around, accumulating it in the internal buffer. Stored energy can be converted into a weak levitation effect, setting mobs on fire underfoot
When consumed, Chorus Fruit teleports to a block along the line of sight within %1$s blocks
tooltip.relics.arrow_quiver.ability.2.de: Next shot deals area damage proportional to the distance to the target
tooltip.relics.lucky_horseshoe.ability.1: With a %1$s chance increases wearer's looting
tooltip.relics.lucky_horseshoe.ability.2: With a %1$s chance increases wearer's luck
tooltip.relics.magic_mirror.ability.1.de: Teleports to the latest respawn point
tooltip.relics.ice_breaker.ability.3.des: Creates powerful explosive wave when fell on the ground
tooltip.relics.infinity_ham.ability.1.de: An infinite food that restores %1$s of hunger per use. Has %2$s charges, restoring every %3$s sec.
tooltip.relics.slime_heart.ability.2.des: Suppresses fall damage, bouncing wearer from the ground. Holding down the %1$s key will prevent ability triggering
tooltip.relics.horse_flute.ability.1.des: Using on a tamed horse will place it in a special enclosure outside of space and time. Reuse of relic will free horse at the player's current position
tooltip.relics.horse_flute.ability.2.des: Moving more than %1$s blocks away from a tamed horse will automatically apply "Enclosure" ability to it
tooltip.relics.wool_mitten.ability.1.des: Snowballs deal %1$s damage on hit. Damage increasing by %2$s for every second the snowball flies

tooltip.relics.ghost_skin_talisman.abili: Projectiles will fly through the wearer without causing damage

advancements.relics.squire_bag.title: Bottomless bag
